component.name: org.richfaces.ComboBox
component.description: The <rich:comboBox> is a component, that provides editable combo box element on a page.
component.properties:
suggestionValues java.lang.Object Defines the suggestion collection
enableManualInput boolean Enables keyboard input, if "false" keyboard input will be locked. Default value is "true" true
filterNewValues java.lang.Boolean Defines the appearance of values in the list. Default value is "true". true
directInputSuggestions java.lang.Boolean Defines the first value from the suggested in input field. Default value is "false". false
selectFirstOnUpdate java.lang.Boolean Defines if the first value from suggested is selected in pop-up list. Default value is "true". true
showDelay java.lang.Integer Delay between event and pop-up list showing. Default value is "0". 0
hideDelay java.lang.Integer Delay between losing focus and pop-up list closing. Default value is "0". 0
width java.lang.String Width of the component. Default value is "150". "150"
tabindex java.lang.String
listWidth java.lang.String Defines width of file popup list
listHeight java.lang.String Defines height of file pop-up list. Default value is "200px". "200px"
onchange java.lang.String
""
onfocus java.lang.String
""
onlistcall java.lang.String The clientside script method to be called when the list is called ""
onlistclose java.lang.String The clientside script method to be called when the list is closed ""
onselect java.lang.String
""
disabled boolean Makes component disabled. . Default value is "false". false
buttonIcon java.lang.String Defines icon for the button element ""
buttonIconDisabled java.lang.String Defines disabled icon for the button element ""
buttonIconInactive java.lang.String Defines inactive icon for the button element ""
defaultLabel java.lang.String Defines default label for the input field element ""
listStyle java.lang.String CSS style rules to be applied to popup list ""
listClass java.lang.String Style Class attribute for the popup list
inputStyle java.lang.String CSS style rules to be applied to input field ""
inputClass java.lang.String Style Class attribute for the input field
inputDisabledStyle java.lang.String CSS style rules to be applied to disabled input ""
inputDisabledClass java.lang.String Style Class attribute for the disabled input
inputInactiveStyle java.lang.String CSS style rules to be applied to inactive input ""
inputInactiveClass java.lang.String Style Class attribute for the inactive input
itemClass java.lang.String Style Class attribute for the items
itemSelectedClass java.lang.String Style Class attribute for the selected item
buttonStyle java.lang.String CSS style rules to be applied to button ""
buttonClass java.lang.String Style Class attribute for the button
buttonDisabledStyle java.lang.String CSS style rules to be applied to disabled button
buttonDisabledClass java.lang.String Style Class attribute for the disabled button ""
buttonInactiveStyle java.lang.String CSS style rules to be applied to inactive button
buttonInactiveClass java.lang.String Style Class attribute for the inactive button ""
style java.lang.String CSS style(s) is/are to be applied when this component is rendered ""
styleClass java.lang.String Corresponds to the HTML class attribute ""
converterMessage java.lang.String
A ValueExpression enabled attribute that, if present, will be used as the text of the converter message, replacing any message that comes from the converter
requiredMessage java.lang.String
A ValueExpression enabled attribute that, if present, will be used as the text of the validation message for the "required" facility, if the "required" facility is used
validatorMessage java.lang.String
A ValueExpression enabled attribute that, if present, will be used as the text of the validator message, replacing any message that comes from the validator
label java.lang.String A localized user presentable name for this component.
&html_input_attributes; &html_input_events; &html_events; &ui_input_attributes;
align java.lang.String
size int
alt java.lang.String
localValueSet boolean
valid boolean
maxlength int
accesskey java.lang.String
